$ec2Client = new Aws\Ec2\Ec2Client([
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2016-11-15',
    'profile' => 'default'
]);

$instanceId = 'InstanceId';

$result = $ec2Client->modifyInstanceAttribute(array(
    'DryRun' => false,
    // InstanceId is required
    'InstanceId' => $instanceId,
    'Attribute' => 'string',
    'Value' => 'string'
));

var_dump($result);
